quoteText:
However, if you choose to make use of certain features of the sites, you may need to provide certain personal information to us.
For example, if you want to create an account on our site, submit a trip request, or review a trip, you will need to provide certain mandatory personal information.
title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
